text: ae imaan waalo! jab tum nashe mein masth ho, namaaz ke qareeb bhi na jaao, jab tak ke apni baath ko samajhne na lago aur janaabath ki haalath mein jab tak ke ghusul na karlo,haan agar raah chalte guzar jaane waale ho to aur baath hai,aur agar tum bimaar ho ya safar mein ho ya tum mein se koyi qaza haajath se aaya ho ya tum ne aurto se mubaasherath ki ho aur tumhe paani na mile to paak mitthi ka qasd8 karo aur apne muh aur apne haath mal lo,be-shak Allah taâ€™ala maaf karne waala baqshne waala hai
